song.title: Russian Rave
song.info:
Lyrics:
Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ!
e ee eee e ee ee
Rano utrom na rasvete, ya poĭdu k svoyeĭ rakete S chemodanchikom v rukah i so shlemom na plechah! Vzmashut lyudi mne rukami, provozhaya menya v putʹ dalʹniĭ YA polechu, kak yarkiĭ luch, sredi yarko-belyh tuch!
Rano utrom na rasvete, ya poĭdu k svoyeĭ rakete S chemodanchikom v rukah i so shlemom na plechah! Vzmashut lyudi mne rukami, provozhaya menya v putʹ dalʹniĭ YA polechu, kak yarkiĭ luch, sredi yarko-belyh tuch!
Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ!
e ee eee e ee ee
Rano utrom na rasvete, ya poĭdu k svoyeĭ rakete S chemodanchikom v rukah i so shlemom na plechah! Vzmashut lyudi mne rukami, provozhaya menya v putʹ dalʹniĭ YA polechu, kak yarkiĭ luch, sredi yarko-belyh tuch!
Rano utrom na rasvete, ya poĭdu k svoyeĭ rakete S chemodanchikom v rukah i so shlemom na plechah! Vzmashut lyudi mne rukami, provozhaya menya v putʹ dalʹniĭ YA polechu, kak yarkiĭ luch, sredi yarko-belyh tuch!
Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ! Yesli ochenʹ zahotetʹ, mozhno v kosmos poletetʹ!
